description: Date on which the survey was conducted
Rocky intertidal site where survey was conducted
The time (24hr clock) when the survey was started
The individual(s) who conducted the survey
One of five permanent quadrats along a 10m transect. Additional quadrats (6-10) done when 1-5 have <50% Phyllospadix cover
The distance along 10m transect where the quadrat is surveyed
Whether the quadrat was laid on the left or right side of the transect
Taxonomic name for a given taxon code
Common vernacular description of what a given code represents (i.e. acorn barnacle, dead acorn barnacle)
The number of individuals of a taxon within the quadrat
The percent cover of a taxon within the quadrat
Whether the count or percent cover for a taxon was estimated
The individual(s) who entered the data into the spreadsheet
The individual(s) who quality controlled the data
Records anything of note about a given observation
